1111100110011111 1110000101000101 1 -> sum: 1101101011100101, cout: 1
0000000000001000 1100010001001000 0 -> sum: 1100010001010000, cout: 0
1011111000010111 1101101100110010 0 -> sum: 1001100101001001, cout: 1
1101101111000101 0110001011111000 1 -> sum: 0011111010111110, cout: 1
0110010101110110 1101010000001101 1 -> sum: 0011100110000100, cout: 1
0011000010100001 1000111011100001 0 -> sum: 1011111110000010, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
